original_text: And I will deliver them into the hand of those that seek their lives, and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of his servants: and afterward it shall be inhabited, as in the days of old, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 그들의 생명을 노리는 자의 손 곧 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 손과 그 종들의 손에 넘기리라 그럴지라도 그 후에는 그 땅이 이전 같이 사람 살 곳이 되리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: into the hand of those that seek their lives
and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon
and into the hand of his servants
and afterward it shall be inhabited
as in the days of old
